data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge of Chinese Phasmatodea III: Catalogue of the phasmids of Hainan Island, China, with descriptions of one new genus, one new species and two new subspecies and proposals of three new combinations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, George Wai-Chun (2016): Contribution to the knowledge of Chinese Phasmatodea III: Catalogue of the phasmids of Hainan Island, China, with descriptions of one new genus, one new species and two new subspecies and proposals of three new combinations. Zootaxa 4150 (3): 314-340, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4150.3.4
